Powerup List

PowerupBigHand

A powerup used to obscure the player's view.

PowerupLinePiece

The target player's next piece will be a line piece.

PowerupReverse

Reverses the direction in which the target player's tetris cylinder rotates.

PowerupShrinkRay

Shrinks the target player's playfield.
